policies.name: env_file_protection
policies.description: Block direct access to .env files via read tools
policies.content:
BLOCK IF:
    tool.name IN ["read_file", "cat", "head", "tail", "less", "more", "grep"]
    AND params.path ENDS_WITH ".env"

policies.name: env_variants_protection
policies.description: Block access to .env file variants and nested .env files
policies.content:
BLOCK IF:
    tool.name IN ["read_file", "cat", "head", "tail", "less", "more"]
    AND params.path CONTAINS ".env"

policies.name: env_file_param_protection
policies.description: Block tools using 'file' parameter to access .env
policies.content:
BLOCK IF:
    tool.name IN ["cat", "head", "tail", "less", "more"]
    AND params.file ENDS_WITH ".env"

policies.name: bash_env_protection
policies.description: Block bash commands that access environment
policies.content:
BLOCK IF:
    tool.name == "bash"
    AND params.command CONTAINS "env"

policies.name: bash_cat_env_protection
policies.description: Block bash commands that cat .env files
policies.content:
BLOCK IF:
    tool.name == "bash"
    AND params.command CONTAINS ".env"

policies.name: admin_env_access
policies.description: Allow trusted admin limited .env access with logging
policies.content:
LOG IF:
    tool.name IN ["read_file"]
    AND params.path CONTAINS ".env"
